name: Kings Gauntlet
description:
KINGS GAUNTLET

Kings Gauntlet is a local-multiplayer game where two kings face each other in a real-time chess battle to the last blood.

You need at least one Gamepad  to play.

-----------------------------------------------

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:
Included in the game menus.

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE CONTROLS:
Player2 may use the keyboard and mouse to play.
[WASD] Move
[Mouse] Aim
[Left-Click] Shoot
[LeftShift] Sprint
[Space] Summon

-----------------------------------------------

DEVELOPMENT INFOS:
The game is still in development, we plan to expand it with online play, different arenas, and many playable characters with their own special abilities.
Please let us hear your feedback!

[07/02/2021]:
First prototype release.
